mapper.sql: ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO oms_pub_apply ( ID, A0100, B0100, YSP_ID, YSPDW_ID, AGE, POLITICAL_AFF, JOB, HEALTH, SFSMRY, SMDJ, NSSJ, YSMDJ1, YTMJSSJ1, YSMDJ2, YTMJSSJ2, ZTDW, ZTNRZW, CGSJ, HGSJ, SDGJ, TLSJ, CFRW, CFSY, CGSPDW, PWH, ZYPWH, ZJCGQK, SJCGSJ, SJHGSJ, NFGS, SFYSP, SFZQJWYJ, SCZQJWYJSJ, SFBCZQJWYJ, JWJL, CLSHSFTG, JDCJL, SFZYLD, SFLG, POZNSJD, FMXX, DWJSXS, ZZJL, CXYY, SFTSRY, SFZB, SFBG, SQZT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, SORT_ID ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.a0100}, #{item.b0100}, #{item.yspId}, #{item.yspdwId}, #{item.age}, #{item.politicalAff}, #{item.job}, #{item.health}, #{item.sfsmry}, #{item.smdj}, #{item.nssj}, #{item.ysmdj1}, #{item.ytmjssj1}, #{item.ysmdj2}, #{item.ytmjssj2}, #{item.ztdw}, #{item.ztnrzw}, #{item.cgsj}, #{item.hgsj}, #{item.sdgj}, #{item.tlsj}, #{item.cfrw}, #{item.cfsy}, #{item.cgspdw}, #{item.pwh}, #{item.zypwh}, #{item.zjcgqk}, #{item.sjcgsj}, #{item.sjhgsj}, #{item.nfgs}, #{item.sfysp}, #{item.sfzqjwyj}, #{item.sczqjwyjsj}, #{item.jwjl}, #{item.clshsftg}, #{item.jdcjl}, #{item.sfzyld}, #{item.sflg}, #{item.poznsjd}, #{item.fmxx}, #{item.dwjsxs}, #{item.zzjl}, #{item.cxyy}, #{item.sftsry}, #{item.sfzb}, #{item.sfbg}, #{item.sqzt}, #{item.createUser}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyUser}, #{item.modifyTime}, #{item.sortId} )
mapper.update:
update oms_pub_apply
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TIME_STAMP = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARBINARY},
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_NUMBER = #{messageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NGR = #{ngr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NGSJ = #{ngsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FWSJ = #{fwsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZSDW = #{zsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSDW = #{csdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFDW = #{cfdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FWLX = #{fwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
